name: impbidd
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3

stmt.origin: syl6c(w0, w1, wb(w2, w3), wi(w2, w3), wi(w3, w2))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wb(w2, w3)))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wi(w2, w3)))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wi(w3, w2)))
-| wi(wi(w2, w3), wi(wi(w3, w2), wb(w2, w3)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wb(w2, w3)))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wi(w2, w3)))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wi(w3, w2)))
-| wi(wi(w2, w3), wi(wi(w3, w2), wb(w2, w3)))

body.origin: |- wi(wi(w2, w3), wi(wi(w3, w2), wb(w2, w3)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wb(w2, w3)))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wi(w2, w3)))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wi(w3, w2)))

comment: Deduce an equivalence from two implications. Double deduction associated with ~ impbi and ~ impbii . Deduction associated with ~ impbid . (Contributed by Rodolfo Medina, 12-Oct-2010.)
